GroupInfo.title: Use Case "SGML": Standard Generalized Markup Language
GroupInfo.description: The example document and queries in this Use Case were first created for a 1992 conference on Standard Generalized Markup Language (SGML).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q1
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate all paragraphs in the report (all "para" elements occurring anywhere within the "report" element).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q2
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate all paragraph elements in an introduction (all "para" elements directly contained within an "intro" element).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q3
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate all paragraphs in the introduction of a section that is in a chapter that has no introduction (all "para" elements directly contained within an "intro" element directly contained in a "section" element directly contained in a "chapter" element. The "chapter" element must not directly contain an "intro" element).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q4
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate the second paragraph in the third section in the second chapter (the second "para" element occurring in the third "section" element occurring in the second "chapter" element occurring in the "report").

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q5
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate all classified paragraphs (all "para" elements whose "security" attribute has the value "c").

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q6
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: List the short titles of all sections (the values of the "shorttitle" attributes of all "section" elements, expressing each short title as the value of a new element.).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q7
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate the initial letter of the initial paragraph of all introductions (the first character in the content [character content as well as element content] of the first "para" element contained in an "intro" element).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q8a
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate all sections with a title that has "is SGML" in it. The string may occur anywhere in the descendants of the title element, and markup boundaries are ignored.

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q8b
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Same as (Q8a), but the string "is SGML" cannot be interrupted by sub-elements, and must appear in a single text node.

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q9
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate all the topics referenced by a cross-reference anywhere in the report (all the "topic" elements whose "topicid" attribute value is the same as an "xrefid" attribute value of any "xref" element).

test-case.name: sgml-queries-results-q10
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: Locate the closest title preceding the cross-reference ("xref") element whose "xrefid" attribute is "top4" (the "title" element that would be touched last before this "xref" element when touching each element in document order).
